participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, Ethan loves exploring the outdoors and tackling new challenges.
participant_1.background: my favorite activity is rock climbing. i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer. i have a black lab named trooper. i like to go hiking in the spring.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and family-oriented, Samantha enjoys spending time with her siblings and trying out new foods.
participant_2.background: i live in alabama. i like tacos. i have one brother. i have three sisters.
